mapper.select:
select dv.device_id, dv.device_code, dv.device_name, dv.inspection_interval, dv.next_inspection_date
from tb_device dv where dv.need_inspection = 1 and dv.device_id = #{deviceId}

select dv.device_id, dv.device_code, dv.device_name, dv.metering_interval, dv.next_metering_date
from tb_device dv where dv.need_metering = 1 and dv.device_id = #{deviceId}

select dv.device_id, dv.device_code, dv.device_name, dv.maintenance_interval, dv.next_maintenance_date
from tb_device dv where dv.need_maintain = 1 and dv.device_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_device ( device_code, device_name, hospital_id, dept_id, picture1, picture2, picture3, picture4, picture5, asset_no, device_model, device_desc, device_state, device_type, serial_number, usage_state, qr_code, manufacturer, producing_place, setup_date, accessory, accept_date, accept_remark, accept_file, use_date, device_owner, storage_date, purchase_amount, maintenance_end_date, warranty_begin_date, warranty_end_date, warranty_amount, warranty_content, sales_supplier, sales_supplier_contact, sales_supplier_phone, sales_supplier_desc, after_sale_provider, after_sale_provider_engineer, after_sale_provider_phone, after_sale_provider_desc, contract_id, setup_case_id, need_inspection, inspection_interval, next_inspection_date, need_metering, metering_interval, next_metering_date, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier ) values ( #{deviceCode}, #{deviceName}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picture1}, #{picture2}, #{picture3}, #{picture4}, #{picture5}, #{assetNo}, #{deviceModel}, #{deviceDesc}, #{deviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialNumber}, #{usageState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qrCode}, #{manufacturer}, #{producingPlace}, to_timestamp(#{setupDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{accessory}, to_timestamp(#{acceptDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{acceptRemark}, #{acceptFile}, to_timestamp(#{useDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{deviceOwner}, to_timestamp(#{storageDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{purchaseAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_timestamp(#{maintenanceEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{warrantyBeginDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{warrantyEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{warrantyAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warrantyContent}, #{salesSupplier}, #{salesSupplierContact}, #{salesSupplierPhone}, #{salesSupplierDesc}, #{afterSaleProvider}, #{afterSaleProviderEngineer}, #{afterSaleProviderPhone}, #{afterSaleProviderDesc}, #{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{setupCaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{needInspection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inspectionInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_timestamp(#{nextInspectionDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{needMetering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{meteringInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_timestamp(#{nextMeteringDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update tb_device
device_code = #{deviceCode},
device_name = #{deviceName},
hospital_Id = #{hospitalId},
dept_id = #{departmentId},
picture1 = #{picture1},
picture2 = #{picture2},
picture3 = #{picture3},
picture4 = #{picture4},
picture5 = #{picture5},
asset_no = #{assetNo},
device_model = #{deviceModel},
device_desc = #{deviceDesc},
device_state = #{deviceState},
device_type = #{deviceType},
serial_number = #{serialNumber},
usage_state = #{usageState},
qr_code = #{qrCode},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer},
producing_place = #{producingPlace},
accessory = #{accessory},
setup_date = to_timestamp(#{setupDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
accept_date = to_timestamp(#{acceptDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
accept_remark = #{acceptRemark},
accept_file = #{acceptFile},
use_date = to_timestamp(#{useDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
device_owner = #{deviceOwner},
storage_date = to_timestamp(#{storageDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
purchase_amount = #{purchaseAmount},
maintenance_end_date = to_timestamp(#{maintenanceEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
warranty_begin_date = to_timestamp(#{warrantyBeginDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
warranty_end_date = to_timestamp(#{warrantyEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
warranty_amount = #{warrantyAmount},
warranty_content = #{warrantyContent},
sales_supplier = #{salesSupplier},
sales_supplier_contact = #{salesSupplierContact},
sales_supplier_phone = #{salesSupplierPhone},
sales_supplier_desc = #{salesSupplierDesc},
after_sale_provider = #{afterSaleProvider},
after_sale_provider_engineer = #{afterSaleProviderEngineer},
after_sale_provider_phone = #{afterSaleProviderPhone},
after_sale_provider_desc = #{afterSaleProviderDesc},
contract_id = #{contractId},
need_inspection = #{needInspection},
inspection_interval = #{inspectionInterval},
next_inspection_date = to_timestamp(#{nextInspectionDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
need_maintain = #{needMaintain},
maintenance_interval = #{maintenanceInterval},
next_maintenance_date = to_timestamp(#{nextMaintenanceDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
need_metering = #{needMetering},
metering_interval = #{meteringInterval},
next_metering_date = to_timestamp(#{nextMeteringDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier}
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and setup_case_id = #{setupCaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select device_id from tb_device where setup_case_id = #{setupCaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update tb_device set setup_date = to_timestamp(#{setupDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where setup_case_id = #{setupCaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_device_attachment ( attachment_name, attachment_type, file_type, file_path, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier ) values ( #{attachmentName}, #{attachmentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filePath}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
